title: Ping LOCKED at 97-100ms
body:
Hello, 
I live in Jordan(Country in the Middle East) my ping should be 50-60, this is the average ping in any gaming cafe in my country, but I have 97-100ms all the time, I was wondering if I could do something to make it 60, I'm about to change my internet plan because of it, I wanna know if the problem because of my isp or from me.
> https://imgur.com/XtogxjD

replies.body: I wonder if some of your network settings might not be configured in the best way to reach out servers. Check out the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) on how to setup your Port Forwarding and DNS options. Test those in a quick custom game for me and let me know how that goes.
I tried "Configure your DNS" and hexteck repair tool, now my ping is 109 T-T

Make sure you run through the steps in that [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and not just one or two. If you skip some you may not have found the problem.

Still, if nothing seems to help go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure you send over some game/network logs so they will be able to see what's all going on.
